name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with a robust skill set focused on **observability**, **telemetry**, and integrating **SDKs** for high-performance applications. Proficient in designing and developing **API** solutions within cloud environments such as **AWS** and **Azure**. Over 13 years of experience in programming with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside extensive hands-on expertise in frontend development using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, and backend services utilizing **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 
Demonstrated ability in community collaboration and effective teamwork, with strong communication skills to document and convey complex technical concepts. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered solutions, utilizing frameworks for predictive analytics, infrastructure automation, and real-time data processing. Committed to compliance-driven development, adhering to HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, and well-versed in MLOps practices using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
